title: Hybrid cooling tower saves water while also being modular for faster construction (Engineers Australia)
text: ( Source : Engineers Australia ) Researchers from The University of Queensland 's Geothermal Energy Centre of Excellence (QGECE) have developed hybrid cooling tower technology that reduce water consumption in thermal power generation, while
